string-array.name: active_assertive_passive
string-array.item: The patients are being examined by a doctor.
His clothes have been stolen by a thief.
He was laughed at by all his friends.
We have been invited by Geeta.
You will be helped by Gouri sen.
A question was asked by him.
A pen was bought by him.
A pen was given to me by him.
All the letters have been written by him.
The poem has been written by him.
The poors are being helped by him.
A letter is being written by him.
A remarkable discovery was made by him.
You may be insulted by you.
A book is read everyday by him.
We are taught English by him.
A new car was being drove by him.
An application is going to be writen by me.
A latter is being written by me.
This can be done by me.
The coin was given to her by me.
The letter has been posted by me.
The form must be filled in by me.
He was phoned yesterday by me.
The lesson will be learnt by me .
A letter was written to the Headmaster by me.
That book was written by me
A latter was written to God by Leneho.
Rice is being cooked by mother.
I am being taught English by Mr. Das.
I shall be taught English next month by Mr. john.
A new car was bought last month by mr.saikia.
Rice is being cooked now by my aunt.
A letter was written to the headmaster by my father.
A latter was given to me by my friend.
An S. M. S. Was sent to me by my friend .
This book was written by my friend.
The meeting was presided over by our principle.
Books are bought every month by our teacher.
He was called kalidas by people .
This school was established in 1960 by people.
Ranghar was built by pramatta singha.
Good news is expected by her.
Two sarees are being bought by her.
It must be done by some one
Cricket is being played today by the boys.
Cricket is being played in the field by the boys.
The accident was caused by the carelessness of the driver.
The patient is being examined by the doctor.
The plants are being watered by the gardener.
The bird was killed by the girl.
A letter was being written by the girl.
The tiger was killed by the hunter.
A ticket will be given to you by the manager.
The president is selected by the members.
I was shocked at the news.
The culprits were arrested by the police.
Letters are delivered every day by the postman.
The letters are being delivered by the postman.
The letters were being delivered by the post man
The stage was decorated by the students.
He was elected secretary by the students.
The programme was organised by the students.
He has been appointed captain by the teacher.
Our copies are being corrected by the teacher
A house is being built by them.
The boy was asked many questions by them.
Many questions were asked by them.
He was elected president by them.
I was invited to the party by them.
The matter was discussed thoroughly by us.
He was made captain of our team by us.
He was made captain by us.
He was made chairman of the committee by us.
The child was made cry by us.
Our duties must be done by us.
He was elected captain of our class by us.
Our country should be loved by us.
Our elders should be respected by us.
The work must be finished by you.
The answer must be written in ink by you.
The answer must be written in ink by you.
Your parents should be obeyed by you.
This question should be raised now by you.

string-array.item: A doctor is examining the patients.******
